name: Faint Frontiers
description:
Welcome to the protoype of our action game! We hope you will enjoy giving it a try and leaving us some constructive criticism.

Source code: https://github.com/TP19/Faint-Frontiers
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/wKGPr3bXqS

Controls:

WASD - Movement (up is top-right)

J - Melee Attack (does 10 damage)

K + Movement - Ranged Attack (does 5 damage, bullet trajectory is determined by movement during shot)

L - Dash (does no damage, moves you quickly and allows to slide throgh objects/enemies)

I - Block (blocks full damage, restricts movement, destroys spider nets)

F1 - Main Menu (progress is reset)

Gameplay:

Kill all the enemies and get the maximum amount of points in shortest amount of time possible. 

Enemies:

  • Snow Spider - shoots spider nets that blocks player's movement completely (does no damage) and during this approaches to inflict damage from close combat. Does little damage and can be killed easily.
  • Spectre Ghost - shoots laser beams and becomes invincible for 6 seconds when in critical life condition. Does high damage and is harder to kill.
